Amazon R6i Instance Types Information

r6i is a family of instance types.
Amazon R6i instances are powered by 3rd-generation Intel Xeon Scalable processors.
3rd-generation Intel Xeon Scalable processors are code named Ice Lake.
Amazon R6i instances are an ideal fit for memory-intensive workloads.
Amazon R6i instances offer up to 15% better compute price performance than comparable R5 instance types.
Amazon R6i instances offer up to 20% higher memory bandwidth per vCPU than comparable R5 instance types.
R5 instance types are comparable to Amazon R6i instances.
